helper¶

helper.calculate_mesh_midpoints_and_volumes(mesh)[source]¶
helper.get_text(text, color='white', atrb=0, cls=None)[source]¶

Returns text text from calling class cls for printing at a later time.

Parameters:
  • text (string) – the text to print
  • color (string) – the color of the text to print
  • atrb (int) – attributes to send use by colored package
  • cls (object) – the calling class
helper.print_min_max(u, title, color='97')[source]¶

Print the minimum and maximum values of u, a Vector, Function, or array.

Parameters:
  • u (GenericVector, ndarray, Function, int, float, Constant) – the variable to print the min and max of
  • title (string) – the name of the function to print
  • color (string) – the color of printed text
helper.print_text(text, color='white', atrb=0, cls=None)[source]¶

Print text text from calling class cls to the screen.

Parameters:
  • text (string) – the text to print
  • color (string) – the color of the text to print
  • atrb (int) – attributes to send use by colored package
  • cls (object) – the calling class
